About Ankitha

Ankitha Kini is a visual storyteller working in Eindhoven, The Netherlands. If you have a story to tell, she will figure out the best way to tell it, be it through animation, illustration, games or apps. When sheâ€™s not splashing colors around, Ankitha also loves to travel, read and taste strange cuisine. She draws from her own experience of the world, to add originality and imagination to everything she makes.

Skills

  • Animation

  • Character Design

  • Illustration

  • Conceptualization

Testimonials

Ankitha is a truly gifted animator with an eye for detail. The broad sweep is beautiful, but the details are all there. Color matches - perfect. Facial expression - humorous and lively. Timing - genius.

- Keenan Smith , Meteorologist & Filmmaker
